mapper.select: SELECT A.boardId, A.title, A.contents, A.createDate, B.nickName, B.company, A.count FROM board A LEFT OUTER JOIN account B ON A.createId = B.id WHERE A.delCon = 'N' ORDER BY boardId DESC LIMIT ${columnIndex}, ${columnNumber}
SELECT A.boardId, A.title, A.contents, A.createDate, B.nickName, B.company, A.count FROM board A LEFT OUTER JOIN account B ON A.createId = B.id WHERE A.boardId = ${boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, contents, createDate, createId, count) VALUE ('${title}', '${contents}', NOW(), ${createId}, 0)
